statements: SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, priority_level, created_at FROM support_tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_description, priority_level FROM support_tickets WHERE priority_level > 3;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, priority_level FROM support_tickets WHERE support_agent_id = 123 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_description FROM support_tickets WHERE priority_level > 2 AND support_agent_id = 456 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, priority_level DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description, created_at FROM support_tickets WHERE priority_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND ticket_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 1 ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, issue_description, priority, status, timestamp FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, priority, status FROM tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT agent_name, department, availability FROM agents WHERE availability='Available';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, department, specialization FROM agents ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status='Open' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT issue_description, priority, status FROM tickets WHERE priority='High' AND status='Open';
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM tickets WHERE priority='Low' AND status='In Progress';
SELECT agent_name, department, availability FROM agents ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT agent_name, department, specialization FROM agents WHERE availability='Available';
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE ticket_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM CustomerSupportAgents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, response_message FROM TicketResponses WHERE agent_id = 2;
SELECT agent_name, hire_date FROM CustomerSupportAgents WHERE department = 'Tech Support';
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_description, open_timestamp FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE close_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM CustomerSupportAgents ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT response_message, response_timestamp FROM TicketResponses WHERE response_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND response_timestamp <= '2022-06-30';

SELECT CustomerSupportTickets.ticket_id, CustomerSupportAgents.agent_name FROM CustomerSupportTickets JOIN TicketResponses ON CustomerSupportTickets.ticket_id = TicketResponses.ticket_id JOIN CustomerSupportAgents ON TicketResponses.agent_id = CustomerSupportAgents.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status FROM tickets WHERE ticket_category = 'Technical Support';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 2;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE ticket_id = 1000;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_category, ticket_open_date FROM tickets WHERE ticket_close_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_opened_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_opened_at FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status='Open';
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM agents WHERE agent_department='Tech Support';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT response_text, response_timestamp FROM ticket_responses WHERE response_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, ticket_status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_department FROM agents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT SUM(rating) AS total_rating, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM response_ratings;
